snippet.title: Crowman & Wolfboy - iOS Trailer
snippet.description:
App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/crowman-wolfboy/id703247992?mt=8

Steam Greenlight: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=202830764

Android version coming soon!

Crowman & Wolfboy is an action/adventure game. Save shadow babies! Collect light orbs! Fend off an ancient evil as you help Crowman & Wolfboy escape the Darkness of their home world and seek out the mysterious "humans"!

LIKE Crowman & Wolfboy at: https://www.facebook.com/CandWiOS


Shot & Directed by 'The Wither Studios Collective'
Storyboards: Steve Gabry
Editing & FX: Doyle Daigle II & Steve Gabry
Music & SFX: Doyle Daigle II
Actors: Mike Thomas, Doyle Daigle II, Brian Turner, Brian Urban & John Cobb
Costume Design: Steve Gabry, Doyle Daigle II, Maggie Negrete
